column16:
Use #T8_miaryzo
to share tech about this character on Twitter

column2:
Several Fighting God moves are enhanced.
Can access Tromba at any time without
the aid of walls with b+3+4 (or u+3+4 / d+3+4).
column7:
Quick heat engager that can be used for punishment. 
 The second hit is a high that can be ducked under.

Safe heat engager you can use to fish for Heat activation 
 in the neutral. Tracks well against sidestep right.

Useful for punishment and as a guaranteed follow-up after 
 moves such as u+1+2.
Safe homing heat engager out of stance.

Fast heat engager from stance. The second hit is a high that 
 can be ducked under.

Quick jab to start offense and check situations. It has a 
 strong extension in 1,2,2 that can be used to counterhit 
 opponents overextending in their pressure, and 1,1,2 which  
 can be hit confirmed, making it a great optionf or poking.
column12:
BAO.2 T! ⏵ (sidestep right) df+4~F MOR.u+1+2 ⏵ 
b+3,4,2~F MOR.1,2

(sidestep right)  f,f+3 ⏵ df+4~F MOR.u+1+2 ⏵ 
b+3,4,2~F MOR.1,2

column7:
Mid poke to harass the opponent. It has good extensions 
 you can use for pressure as well.

Fast homing high attack to check sidestepping opponents. 
 If you shift to MOR by holding forward, you can make the
 string safe by later cancelling out of the stance with db.

column2:
d+2
FC df+4
CH u+3
CH b+4
CH df+3+4

column7:
A fast and safe mid counterhit launcher. Good for fishing 
 for counterhits at close range. Can shift to MOR by holding 
 forward to create stance pressure on normal hit.
column12:
db+3 ⏵ ws+4 ⏵ df+4~F MOR.u+1+2 ⏵ b+3,4,2~F MOR.1,4 ⏵
BAO.2 T! ⏵ uf+1

column7: Low pokes to harass the opponent.
column12:
(sidestep right)  f,f+3 ⏵ df+4~F MMO.u+1+2 ⏵ 
b+3,4,2~F MMO.1,2

column7:
Strong high attack you can use for approaching. Can shift 
 to stance for presure by holding down and leads to a 
 guaranteed follow-up on hit.

Slow, but safe wallsplatting attack. The direction of the 
 knockdown can be changed by inputting either uf+4,u+2 or 
 u+4,d+2. During heat, it can also be used for pressure.
Safe mid launcher you can use for keepout and punishment.
A risky launcher that can be used to hit grounded opponents.
STANDING
column12:
After tornado, you can heatburst after the last hit of the
(b+3),4,2~F string to extend your combo.

You can use b+1,4 for medium wallsplat and df+4 for when the 
wall is already close.

3,2 (heat)
df+1,4
column12: Use uf+1 to break floors and qcf+1 to break walls
